vulnerabilities.description:
## Overview
[cryptiles](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cryptiles) is a package for general crypto utilities.

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Insecure Randomness. The `randomDigits()` method is supposed to return a cryptographically strong pseudo-random data string, but it was biased to certain digits. An attacker could be able to guess the created digits.

## Remediation
Upgrade to version 4.1.2 and higher.

## References
- [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/hapijs/cryptiles/issues/34)
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/hapijs/cryptiles/commit/9332d4263a32b84e76bf538d7470d01ea63fa047)
vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Randomness
